summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for August 10, 2019, documenting routine operations and staffing issues. The most significant entry notes that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell during the Day Watch Shift.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 who was found unresponsive in his cell during the Day Watch shift on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein found unresponsive
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell during the Day Watch shift at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The report is a Daily Activity Report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 11, 2019, covering activities from August 10, 2019.
It documents that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (ID #76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell during the Day Watch shift.
The report notes ongoing operational issues, including a vacated sanitation assignment and an inoperative control center fire panel due to staff shortages.
The report lists institutional totals, showing 759 inmates at the beginning of the Morning Watch shift on August 10, 2019.
